meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marques Redd Erin Bogart Jayce Newton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3954.

div.div:
2001 College Championship quarterfinal game 2.
From the campus at UCLA.

td.p: Marques Redd, a sophomore at Harvard University from Macon, Georgia
Erin Bogart, a junior at Miami University of Ohio from Cincinnati, Ohio
Jayce Newton, a senior at UCLA from Long Beach, California

tr.td: ARTIFACTS
(Alex: We want you to name the state as we present...)
LICENSE PLATE MOTTOES
COLLEGE FOOTBALL 2000
"FOR"-LETTER WORDS
(Alex: And it came up completely at random...)
UCLA ALUMNI
BREW INNS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Some of these implements survive from the old copper culture of 5,000 years ago--no bait, though')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Some of these implements survive from the old copper culture of 5,000 years ago--no bait, though
